entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
